text: I know that my my marriage sounds like a
coming-out party but quite frankly I'm
guessing that I fall more as bisexual on
the spectrum than lesbian falling in
love with Marceline was probably as much
a surprise to me as to anyone else I
knew when I married Marceline that there
was a chance that I would have to give
up my license was it difficult for you
to relinquish your license it was
incredibly sad for me I a few years ago
I can't celebrated the Eucharist with my
father and so to now be in a position
where I can't I can't serve at the altar
with him I was surprised by how much it
hurt or how it landed because it it
wasn't unexpected how has this affected
your father I mean at some stage she was
once quoted saying he'd rather go to
hell than pray to a homophobic God yeah
I think it has saddened him as well it's
it has saddened him in as much as you
know this is where the the church is now
and yes of course you know he's a father
and
I mean this child you've said that you
hope that this will start a conversation
within the Anglican Church what what is
so absolute that we cannot pass beyond
this point and the reality is that not
only not only do we have gay lesbian
transgender bisexual you know people of
every description sitting in our pews to
be perfectly honest we have all of those
people are standing in our pulpits as
well and yet very often they sit in fear
in the pews and they sit in then they
stand in fear in the pulpits because
they're not free to fully own who they
are and who they love I mean from just
listening to you now it makes me think
that then a part of who you are has been
stripped away from you that's exactly
what it feels like and that I think is
the is the anguish is yeah that's where
it hurts the most
mm-hmm I have to think of all of the
people for whom the choice was I can be
a priest or I can be with the person I
love and I don't I don't get to have
both so in the end you did make a choice
yes you always choose love always choose
love everything else will fall into
place
somehow when in doubt just do the most
loving thing
